extendedInfo.description: Popcorn Goal Tracker is a great way to help your Scout have more fun reaching his popcorn goals!  Help him select three prizes from the prize flyer â a low, mid, and high level â and enter them in the app. Every time he makes a sale he can track it using the animated popcorn popper.  Along the way he will be rewarded for is effort and encouraged to keep going.  The developers of this app are parents of Scouts and Eagle Scouts themselves.  They know the value of helping Scouts learn to set and achieve goals.  As a parent, you will benefit from his increased sales because you will pay less out of pocket to fund his Scouting experience!  We are also excited to share that a portion of the proceeds from this app will be donated back to Scouting.Featuresâ¢ Customizable prize goals, including dollar amountsâ¢ Older Scouts can enter prize goals like: âPhilmontâ, âfishing tripâ, and ânew patrol equipmentâ.â¢ Tracks total sales and number of salesâ¢ Features encouraging of achievement medalsâ¢ Parent Settings feature allows parents to adjust prize goals, total sales, and number of salesIncreases Salesâ¢ Scouts have more fun during the Popcorn Saleâ¢ Parents have to pay less for programâ¢ Packs, Troops, and Councils earn more to fund great programs

reviews.title: Very cool!
reviews.comment: I shared this app with a few Cub Scouts and they can\'t wait to use it. They especially like the fireworks!
reviews.author: James Leffler

reviews.title: Fantastic App for Cub Scouts!
reviews.comment: This is a great little motivator for your Scouts. Cubs giggle and smirk every time the animated popcorn pops.  I am a professional Scout Executive in Iowa and I encourage parents to use this with your Scouts.  It\'s just plain fun.
reviews.author: Todd Wordel

reviews.title: Sweet App
reviews.comment: This app is great. a great way for tracking individual sales and help meet goals. a must have apps if you are a scout
reviews.author: John Dunakey
